name: Marble Man
description:
Download via google Play Store now!!!

It's a ball rolling platformer game with endless mode, time trial levels, mini games, unlockable skins and more!

Using either tilt or joystick controls, take marble man on an adventure around the globe by rolling him round thrilling levels with all kinds of obstacles and challenges to face!

Collect coins to unlock super fun extras or get your speed on and race your friends in the time trial leaderboards!
